mapper.select: SELECT C.MEMBER_NO, C.PRODUCT_NO, C.CART_NO, C.CART_QTY, C.PRODUCT_SIZE, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_PRICE FROM CART C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRO_NO WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (MEMBER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, CART_QTY, PRODUCT_SIZE) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{productNo}, #{cartQty}, #{productSize})
